languages.text: "Лишь в сиянии Его способен человек обрести силу противостоять ужасам, взрашенным светом неведомых звезд. Лишь в воле Его способен узреть смысл своего бытия".

traits.locale_text: [Draft] бла бля я вижу слабость и страх в ваших душах

languages.text: "Only in His radiance can Humanity find the strength to stand against the terrors nourished by the light of stars unknown. Only in His will can Humanity see the purpose of its being."
languages.original_text: "Лишь в сиянии Его способен человек обрести силу противостоять ужасам, взрашенным светом неведомых звезд. Лишь в воле Его способен узреть смысл своего бытия".

traits.locale_text: "Only in His radiance can Humankind find the strength to stand against the terrors nourished by the light of stars unknown. Only in His will can it see the purpose of its being."
"Only in His radiance can Humankind find the strength to stand against the terrors nourished by the light of stars unknown. Only in His will can it see the purpose of its being."
"Only in His radiance can Humanity find the strength to stand against the terrors nourished by the light of stars unknown. Only in His will can Humanity see the purpose of its being."
"Only in His radiance can Humanity find the strength to stand against the terrors nourished by the light of stars unknown. Only in His will can Humanity see the purpose of its being."
"Only in His radiance can Humanity find the strength to stand against the terrors nourished by the light of stars unknown. Only in His will can Humanity see the purpose of its being."

languages.text: “只有在祂的明光中，人类才能找到力量，对抗来自未知群星的恐怖之物。只有在祂的意志中，人类才能看到人类存在的目的。”
languages.original_text: "Only in His radiance can Humanity find the strength to stand against the terrors nourished by the light of stars unknown. Only in His will can Humanity see the purpose of its being."

traits.locale_text: “只有在祂的明光中，人类才能找到力量，对抗来自未知群星的恐怖之物。只有在祂的意志中，人类才能看到人类存在的目的。”

languages.text: «Solo en su resplandor encontrará la Humanidad la fuerza necesaria para resistir a los terrores que ilumina la luz de las estrellas. Solo su voluntad permite a la Humanidad ver su razón de ser».
languages.original_text: "Only in His radiance can Humanity find the strength to stand against the terrors nourished by the light of stars unknown. Only in His will can Humanity see the purpose of its being."

traits.locale_text: «Solo en su resplandor encontrará la Humanidad la fuerza necesaria para resistir a los terrores que ilumina la luz de las estrellas. Solo su voluntad permite a la Humanidad ver su razón de ser».

languages.text: 「神の輝きの中でのみ、人類は未知の星の光で育まれる、恐怖に立ち向かう強さを見つけることができる。皇帝の意志を通してのみ、人類はその存在の目的が分かる」
languages.original_text: "Only in His radiance can Humanity find the strength to stand against the terrors nourished by the light of stars unknown. Only in His will can Humanity see the purpose of its being."

traits.locale_text: 「神の輝きの中でのみ、人類は未知の星の光で育まれる、恐怖に立ち向かう強さを見つけることができる。皇帝の意志を通してのみ、人類はその存在の目的が分かる」

languages.text: "Nur in Seiner Strahlkraft findet die Menschheit die Kraft, sich gegen die Schrecken zu stellen, die vom Licht unbekannter Sterne genährt werden. Nur in Seinem Willen erkennt die Menschheit den Sinn ihres Seins."
languages.original_text: "Only in His radiance can Humanity find the strength to stand against the terrors nourished by the light of stars unknown. Only in His will can Humanity see the purpose of its being."

traits.locale_text: "Nur in Seiner Strahlkraft findet die Menschheit die Kraft, sich gegen die Schrecken zu stellen, die vom Licht unbekannter Sterne genährt werden. Nur in Seinem Willen erkennt die Menschheit den Sinn ihres Seins."

languages.text: « Seule Sa Radiance peut donner à l'humanité la force dont elle a besoin pour se dresser contre les terreurs nées de la lumière des étoiles inconnues. Seule Sa volonté montre à l'humanité sa raison d'être. »
languages.original_text: "Only in His radiance can Humanity find the strength to stand against the terrors nourished by the light of stars unknown. Only in His will can Humanity see the purpose of its being."

traits.locale_text: « Seule Sa Radiance peut donner à l'humanité la force dont elle a besoin pour se dresser contre les terreurs nées de la lumière des étoiles inconnues. Seule Sa volonté montre à l'humanité sa raison d'être. »

languages.text: "İnsanlık, bilinmeyen yıldızların ışığında serpilen dehşetlere karşı duracak gücü, yalnızca O'nun aydınlığında bulabilir. İnsanlık yalnızca O'nun iradesiyle varoluş amacını görebilir."
languages.original_text: "Only in His radiance can Humanity find the strength to stand against the terrors nourished by the light of stars unknown. Only in His will can Humanity see the purpose of its being."

traits.locale_text: "İnsanlık, bilinmeyen yıldızların ışığında serpilen dehşetlere karşı duracak gücü, yalnızca O'nun aydınlığında bulabilir. İnsanlık yalnızca O'nun iradesiyle varoluş amacını görebilir."
